News.headline: Discounted Coach Travel: Southport FC Saturday 11th February
News.page_title: Discounted Coach Travel: Southport FC Saturday 11th February
News.URL_keywords: Discounted Coach Travel Southport FC Saturday 11th February
News.short_description: For any Daggers fan thinking of travelling to Southport FC next Saturday, the supporters club is now offering discounted prices on seats aboard the coach to the Merseyrail Community Stadium
News.description:
Coach travel to Southport FC on Saturday 11th February will be discounted to these new prices:

Members: £15
Non-Members: £20
Children under 16yrs: £8 (Children under 16yrs must be accompanied by an adult)

The old cost for this trip was members £23/ non members £28 and there was no children under 16 price.

To reserve your seat please get in touch with Russell Elmes on this number 07989 901686 by no later than Wednesday 8th February.

The coach departs from Dagenham and Redbridge football club at 8:00am, payment to be made in the supporters club shop before boarding the coach so please arrive in plenty of time, there will be a 45 minute stop at a service station on route to Southport all coaches have toilets on board.

Any queries please contact Russell Elmes on 07989 901686.
